summary: Adds a new race to skyrim with new spells and stand alone armor sets.
descriptionHtml:
BIG Update coming soon about 2 weeks from 10/27/12 It will add a player home, hopefully 5 new spells and 1 new armor. and in the next update after that I might make a quest system to get the spells with a love teacher.

Adds The Blood Masters Race.
They use their own health for special spells that are powerful but can kill you.

1.Blood Spike Cost 5 health (\"This will Change to 20 Health on next update\")
Sends a Spike of your Blood out if it hits your enemy it will absorb their health if not you just wasted your own blood a little.

2.Blood Strom Cost 20 health (\"This will Change to 50 Health on next update\")
Sends a Storm of your Blood out if it hits your enemy it will absorb their health if not you just wasted your own blood a lot of it.

3.Blood Mode Daily Power
You do 2 times the damage for 60s and you heal fully. 

Also adds a craftable armor made of Blood(\"Will have 2 sets of armor on next update\")

Please Endorse if you like this.!?.
First Mod please tell me how im doing?!?
author: codeyhanson
